data.event: In 2004, Symphony Hall benefited from a $850,000 renovation project through a private fund-raising effort.
Cynthia J. Anzalotti, president of Springfield Performing Arts Development Corp., which manages Symphony Hall and CityStage, said she is pleased that the work will now move forward.

event.title: will be completed by early September

data.event: She is optimistic that work will be completed by early September.
Chad LaBumbard, technical director, said the current "extremely antiquated" lighting control system was installed 30 years ago.
Bids will be opened on Thursday for a new "theatrical dimming and controls" system, and on April 10 for window renovations that include replacement of perimeter caulk, painting and repairs.

event.title: April 10 for window renovations that include

data.event: Bids will be opened on Thursday for a new "theatrical dimming and controls" system, and on April 10 for window renovations that include replacement of perimeter caulk, painting and repairs.
